product_name: The Bicycle Book: Wit, Wisdom and Wanderings
long_description: Filled with original stories and illustrations,. Edited by: Jim Joyce. Softcover; 149 pages; black-and-white illustrations. Satya House Publications; copyright 2007. Includes a piece by Pulitzer Prize-winning author, Thomas Hylton, and an interview with Lance Armstrong's long-time coach, Chris Carmichael. Other contributors include Richard Fries, editor of. And, author-cartoonist John Stuart Clark, Bill Joyce, national Catholic Press Award winner, and.
short_description: Filled with original stories and illustrations, The Bicycle Book: Wit, Wisdom and Wanderings celebrates the bicycle and those who love to ride.
